hset h1 a "aha"
hset h1 b "a bit longer, but not very much"
hset h1 c "now this is quite a bit longer, but sort of boring...................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................."

hset h2 a 10
hincrby h2 a 1000
hincrby h2 a 100000

hset h3 a a
hset h3 b b
hdel h3 a
hmset h3 b b2 c c2
hsetnx h3 d d
